Item_GoldenCarrot_Desc: Golden Carrot — Use to summon a horse.
Item_GoldenCarrot2_Desc: Golden Carrot — Use to summon a white horse.
Food_LifeFruit_Desc: A mysterious fruit brought from the world of Terraria. Due to the side effects of temporal displacement, it only grants temporary enhancement. Consuming it temporarily increases maximum health.
Item_ReturnOrb_Desc: A mysterious item brought from Monster Hunter. Use it to evacuate quickly and safely.
Item_MimicTearAshes_Desc: Legendary ashes brought from Elden Ring. Used to summon the Mimic Tear spirit, which takes the form of the summoner and fights alongside them.
Item_SnowPMCAshes_Desc: How could you be so cruel to the adorable Coal Ball?! Using it summons a cute Coal Ball spirit — though you still need to pay it in Bitcoin to hire it.
Quest_GoldenCarrot2_Desc: Rumor has it that within Experimental Zone 37 grows a carrot of pure gold, imbued with mysterious power, capable of summoning a special spirit steed. Defeat several local Observers to prove your strength, and I shall entrust it to you.
Quest_LifeFruit_Name: Echoes of a Fruit from Another World
Quest_LifeFruit_Desc: I have recently been studying a peculiar plant from another world. It is said that this fruit can permanently enhance one's vitality, but due to temporal displacement, it has become highly unstable in this realm. I need natural samples to stabilize its energy—two Greenback Mackerel, along with some fresh fruits: apples and oranges. Bring them to me, and I will restore part of the fruit’s power.
Item_AmmoCase_Desc: A ruggedized hard-shell box specifically designed for storing various types of ammunition. A person with a messy backpack won't survive three minutes on the battlefield.
Quest_AmmoCase_Desc: A gun without bullets is just a pile of scrap metal. My supplier recently got a batch of durable ammo boxes, but those 'black ducks' blocked the road to the west factory area and stole a lot of my assembly parts. Go to the warehouse area and teach them a lesson, and while you're at it, get me the missing parts. After that, I'll put these ammo boxes on the shelves; these things will save you a lot of space in your messy bag.
Item_GunTurretBeacon_Desc: Can call in a temporary automatic turret for fire support.
Item_AGDumbbell_Desc:
An experimental anti-gravity training device developed by an undisclosed research division. 
 A micro gravitational phase-inversion core is embedded within the weight plates, causing the object to exhibit negative gravitational interaction under standard Earth gravity.
